oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Rock House Holiness Church service, 1997 June 15
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hood, Ralph W.; Williamson, W. Paul (William Paul)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Video recording of a homecoming service during which several members of the congregation handle serpents. Video begins with exterior footage of church, worshippers arriving for service, and ends with exterior footage of congregants getting food. Preaching by Bill Pelfry and John Wayne "Punkin" Brown.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Appalachian Region, Southern -- Religious life and customs; Snake cults (Holiness churches) -- Appalachian Region, Southern
Pelfry, Bill; Summerford, Billy;
Rock House Holiness Church (Sand Mountain, Ala.)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: Rock House Holiness Church field recordings, 1996-2004
Ralph W. Hood and W. Paul Williamson field recordings, interviews, and photographs
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:isPartOf: Ralph W. Hood and W. Paul Williamson Holiness Churches of Appalachia recordings and interviews
